title: Ron Shelley: civil engineer
brief_description: Typical experiences of a design engineer working on road and bridge construction in Papua-New Guinea, illustrating the development role of better communications. Discusses living conditions in Port Moresby. Ron Selley works for the Department of Public Works as a Design Engineer, has designed seventy bridges, and travels to remote areas of the Territory for his work.
